summary: THE VEHICLE IS OVER HEATING DUE TO ANTIFREEZE GETTING INTO THE OIL.  CONSUMER STATES' TOOK TO FORD AND THEY REPLACED THE RADIATOR, AND THE PROBLEM WAS STILL OCCURRING.  CONSUMER TOOK VEHICLE TO ANOTHER MECHANIC AND THEY REPLACED THE HEAD GASKETS AND THE OVER HEATING STOPPED.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION. TS
